Control Statement: The organization: a. Approves and monitors nonlocal maintenance and diagnostic activities;b. Allows the use of nonlocal maintenance and diagnostic tools only as consistent with organizational policy and documented in the security plan for the information system;c. Employs strong authenticators in the establishment of nonlocal maintenance and diagnostic sessions;d. Maintains records for nonlocal maintenance and diagnostic activities; ande. Terminates session and network connections when nonlocal maintenance is completed.
